DOC.brief_summary: 1. To determine the influencing factors of modified electroconvulsive therapy (MECT); 2. To determine the influencing factors and reversibility of the cognitive impairment caused by MECT; 3. To determine the duration of efficacy of MECT and its affecting factors.
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy And Cognitive Impairment Of Modified Electroconvulsive Therapy
